original_text: Then he rested with his ancestors and was buried in the city of David his father. And Rehoboam his son succeeded him as king.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 그의 조상들과 함께 자매 그의 아버지 다윗의 성에 장사되고 그의 아들 르호보암이 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: Then he rested with his ancestors
and was buried in the city of David his father
And Rehoboam his son succeeded him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 아들 르호보암이 그를 계승하여
